channel.title: the solution to all forum problems

item.title: the solution to all forum problems
item.dc:creator: sm00t
item.description:
Mabilis:

@ flugelhorny
No forum = No problems.
Forum with huge text + oblivious cockroaches = problems.
OR JUST:
Cockroaches = problems.

What “status” were you when you first posted on the Black Mesa forums?

Read full topic
item.source: the solution to all forum problems

item.title: the solution to all forum problems
item.dc:creator: Mr_McBreakfast
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

I can divide by zero, anything divided by zero = infinity. Just because a calculator can’t do it doesn’t mean you can’t.

The correct term is undefined. Anything divided by zero does not equal infinity, sir. Please stay in school.

Read full topic

fix’d

item.title: the solution to all forum problems
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
It wont matter what we say where to whome and for how long or how often.

Cockroaches will always come here asking “when released?” and “what percent done” and “when media plox!?”

It is life. We must work hard to be kind even though it is the hundreth time we have seen/heard it.
